languages.text: [Показать инфопластину] "Соломон, я тут кое-что прочитал{mf||а}, и у меня есть пара вопросов".
[Show him the data-slate] "Solomorne, I happened to read something here, and I have a few questions."

languages.text: [データスレートを見せる]「ソロモーン、たまたまこれを読んで、いくつか聞きたいことがあるんだ」
languages.original_text: [Show him the data-slate] "Solomorne, I happened to read something here, and I have a few questions."

traits.locale_text: [データスレートを見せる]「ソロモーン、たまたまこれを読んで、いくつか聞きたいことがあるんだ」

languages.text: [Ihm den Datablock zeigen] Solomorne, ich habe hier zufällig etwas gelesen und hätte dazu einige Fragen."
languages.original_text: [Show him the data-slate] "Solomorne, I happened to read something here, and I have a few questions."

traits.locale_text: [Ihm den Datablock zeigen] Solomorne, ich habe hier zufällig etwas gelesen und hätte dazu einige Fragen."

languages.text: [Lui montrer la plaque de données] « Solomorne, un élément de cette plaque a attiré mon attention et j'ai quelques questions à vous poser. »
languages.original_text: [Show him the data-slate] "Solomorne, I happened to read something here, and I have a few questions."

traits.locale_text: [Lui montrer la plaque de données] « Solomorne, un élément de cette plaque a attiré mon attention et j'ai quelques questions à vous poser. »

languages.text: [Mostrarle la tablilla de datos] «Solomorne, acabo de leer aquí una cosa y tengo varias preguntas para usted».
languages.original_text: [Show him the data-slate] "Solomorne, I happened to read something here, and I have a few questions."

traits.locale_text: [Mostrarle la tablilla de datos] «Solomorne, acabo de leer aquí una cosa y tengo varias preguntas para usted».

languages.text: [将数据板交给他]“我碰巧看到了某些东西，索罗蒙。我有几个问题要问你。”
languages.original_text: [Show him the data-slate] "Solomorne, I happened to read something here, and I have a few questions."

traits.locale_text: [将数据板交给他]“我碰巧看到了某些东西，索罗蒙。我有几个问题要问你。”

languages.text: [Ona databelayı göster] "Solomorne, bunu okurken aklıma birkaç şey takıldı."
